厭世: (えんせい) - pessimism; weariness with life
厭世自殺: (えんせいじさつ) - (yoji) killing oneself out of despair (disgust with life)
厭世観: (えんせいかん) - (ant: 楽天観) pessimistic view of life; pessimism
厭厭: (いやいや) - unwillingly/grudgingly/reluctantly; shaking head in refusal (to children); no!/no no!/not at all
厭戦気分: (えんせんきぶん) - (yoji) feeling of war-weariness
厭離穢土: (おんりえど) - (yoji) abhorrence of (living in) this impure world
厭魅: (えんみ) - killing someone with a magical curse
厳か: (おごそか) - solemn (e.g. ceremony, atmosphere); austere; majestic; dignified; stately; awful; impressive
厳しい: (kibishii) - severe, strict, rigid, unsparing, relentless; intense (ex. frio), harsh, tough
厳しい批評: (きびしいひひょう) - severe criticism
厳しさを増す: (きびしさをます) - to grow in severity; to grow increasingly severe
厳として: (げんとして) - resolutely; determinedly; strictly; authoritatively; solemnly; gravely; starkly; undeniably
厳に: (げんに) - strictly; severely; rigidly; fortify; strengthen; secure
厳めしい顔付き: (いかめしいかおつき) - grave (stern) look
厳君: (げんくん) - your honored father; your honoured father
厳命: (げんめい) - strict order; peremptory command
厳守: (げんしゅ) - strict observance; adherence; scrupulous compliance
厳密にいうと: (げんみつにいうと) - strictly speaking
厳密にいえば: (げんみつにいえば) - strictly speaking
厳密に言うと: (げんみつにいうと) - strictly speaking
厳密に言えば: (げんみつにいえば) - strictly speaking
厳密認証: (げんみつにんしょう) - strong authentication
厳寒の候: (げんかんのこう) - the coldest season (weather)
厳戒態勢: (げんかいたいせい) - high alert; a state of high alert; on alert
厳探: (げんたん) - strict search; sharp lookout
厳格: (げんかく) - severe; rigid; stern; strictness; rigor; rigour; austerity
厳正: (げんせい) - strictness; impartiality; exactness; rigidness
厳正中立: (げんせいちゅうりつ) - (yoji) strict neutrality
厳然: (げんぜん) - grave; solemn; majestic; stern; authoritative
厳父: (げんぷ) - your honored father; your honoured father
厳禁: (げんきん) - strict prohibition; ban; interdiction
厳粛: (genshuku) - grave, solemn, serious; harsh (por exemplo, verdade), hard, strict
厳罰: (げんばつ) - severe punishment; rigorous measures
厳罰化: (げんばつか) - toughening the law; making the law stricter
厳談: (げんだん) - strong protest; demand for an explanation; serious talk
厳選: (gensen) - seleção cuidadosa, triagem cuidadosa, escolha criteriosa
厳重: (げんじゅう) - strict; rigour; rigor; severe; firm; strong; secure
厳重注意: (げんじゅうちゅうい) - reprimand; stern warning
去なす: (いなす) - to parry; to sidestep; to dodge
去ぬ: (いぬ) - to go home; to go/to leave; to pass (of time); to die; to go bad/to rot
去る: (さる) - to leave/to go away; to pass/to elapse; to be distant; to send away/to drive off/to divorce; (after a -masu stem, esp. of a suru verb) ... completely; (去る only) (ant: 来る・きたる・1) last ... (e.g. "last April")
去る十一月: (さるじゅういちがつ) - last November
去る者は日々に疎し: (さるものはひびにうとし) - Out of sight, out of mind
去る者は追わず: (さるものはおわず) - do not pursue those who leave you
去る者は追わず来たる者は拒まず: (さるものはおわずきたるものはこばまず) - do not chase one who leaves, do not reject one who comes
去る者日日に疎し: (さるものひびにうとし) - Out of sight, out of mind
去る者追わず: (さるものおわず) - do not chase the one who leaves (Confucius)
去勢コンプレックス: (きょせいコンプレックス) - castration complex
去就: (きょしゅう) - (one's) course of action; (one's) position; (one's) attitude
去年末: (きょねんまつ) - end of last year
